item.title: Dodian Help!
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

ok i can do the d bow lmfao here yea go go into constand.java then just replace one of the long bows with ur dbow code…

and making it shoot arrows /W

			if (wearID == 15156) {
				// DBow
				
				playerSEA = 426;
				playerSEW = 1660;
				playerSER = 1661;
				playerSE = 1832;
				
			}

Replace the 15156 with ur code,

Making barrage freeze,

putn this in boolean process

movetimer -= 1;
if ((cantmove == true) && (movetimer <= 0)) {
cantmove = false;

	}
	if (cantmove == true) {
		teleportToX = 3095;
		teleportToY = 3313;
		
		
	}

Add this void

public void freeze(int time) {
	cantmove = true;
	movetimer = time;
	
}

Then when you wanna freeze some one just put in freeze(30); 30 = seconds

item.title: Dodian Help!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

only you can help!
all your problems can be solved by simply looking in the files
if a bow shoots in your server how simple do you think it is to add the same exact thing but replace the ID?
same with the other ones, im sure dodian has atleast 1 form of entangle…use it
requirements SAME THING WELL YA LOOK AT THAT, find a requirement you already have for a wep, add it the exact same but change ints…
use stuff you have right in front of you!
